sketch.compiler.spin

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • sketch.compiler.spin.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for managing the options that SPIN understands. This class knows how to convert abstract SPIN options into the preprocessor directives that SPIN models understand.
    Author:
    Chris Jones

        public void stateHashTableSize(int lgN)
